title: Quick question. why are sennas souls worth gold when threshes arent? Dont really get the logic.
body:
Idk just dont get why her wraiths are even worth gold when her passive is just better thresh passive. I mean they give more stats more gold and drop more often (because if she hits an enemy twice she gets a stack). So like.... why? 

I dont think its op its 3 fucking gold but like where in the design process of her passive where they like "sennas passive needs to drop gold when it gives Crit, range, AD, and lifesteal because her other 4 ability's are so much weaker then threshes".

Meanwhile with thresh passive its like "here have .75 ap and armor and your only allowed to get them from stuff dying near you nothing else try not to die hehe". Be nice if it gave like hp or something. Or if you got a stack every time you landed Q.

replies.body: Tank items cost less then carry damage items. Senna is intended to buy full damage items, thus she needs a consistent supplemental income. It's the same reason why Pyke has the gold share on his ult, so that he can get kills (and thus the gold income he needs), and won't be stealing money from his carry.

> [{quoted}](name=Wulf Helhammer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-17T03:15:20.584+0000)
>
> Tank items cost less then carry damage items. Senna is intended to buy full damage items, thus she needs a consistent supplemental income. It's the same reason why Pyke has the gold share on his ult, so that he can get kills (and thus the gold income he needs), and won't be stealing money from his carry.

Tank items are also garbage compared to carry items, so what's your point?

> [{quoted}](name=Minimac2000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2020-02-17T06:14:31.654+0000)
>
> Tank items are also garbage compared to carry items, so what's your point?

I mean, thats factually not true. Defense items by default are better than offensive ones, given CC exists, base damage is high and all damage is 0 when youre dead. 

Offensive items outscale defensive ones so defense doesnt get out of hand later, but the general rule is the same. It doesnt matter how much damage you do when you are CCd or dead, and a proper teamcomp will have numerous ways to deal with someone who has amassed a lead for themselves with proper play.

There is a reason why your team invests so much into protecting the one person on your team who builds damage. Its not because ADCs are amazing at teamfights, theyre pretty garbage at it, and your team has to put a lot of its cost into keeping them alive. Its because you need someone to damage objectives, which takes offensive power to do quickly.

If objectives werent that hard to take, ADCs would be useless and no one would run them. Youd also never see more than 1 or 2 offensive items. Theres no need to take that risk when defensive items are just far more effective.
So because she deals more damage then thresh she gets more gold..... i don't get it.

> [{quoted}](name=YaraOwO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-02-17T03:16:55.629+0000)
>
> So because she deals more damage then thresh she gets more gold..... i don't get it.

Marksman items cost more, so the 3 gold helps her itemize. Thresh's tank support items won't cost as much as Senna's lethality items.

this is why pyke an "assassin" support works too. cuz his ult shares kill gold making it 100% better if he gets the kill then the "carry" 


only way to make stuff like this work is to bend the rules .

remember mord bot it worked cuz he get more XP and out leveled and healed everything ?
Maybe because damage is a a marskman's mission like her? and Thresh is not one?

> [{quoted}](name=YaraOwO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-02-17T03:16:55.629+0000)
>
> So because she deals more damage then thresh she gets more gold..... i don't get it.

Doesn't really matter the gold income is factored into the power of the souls. How much more power is Senna's Souls giving compared to Thresh and how much more often are they?

oh lets not forget they took gold income from ASHE cuz they claimed it wasnt balanced. 

changed TF gold passive .

It because Senna's souls are killable. Threshs souls aren't. Riot has a standard gold distribution for champion generated things with healthbars so that they always give gold. Like Zyra's plants and Malzahar's voidlings.

> [{quoted}](name=The Dreamwalker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-02-17T04:46:19.792+0000)
>
> It because Senna's souls are killable. Threshs souls aren't. Riot has a standard gold distribution for champion generated things with healthbars so that they always give gold. Like Zyra's plants and Malzahar's voidlings.

That would work if they moved away from her or attacked her for damage, but they don't. They just sit there inside senna's 6-700 attack range and give her more. Thresh risks dying every time he goes for a soul. Senna doesn't it's as simple as that why they shouldn't give gold, they aren't alive and they aren't a risk

> [{quoted}](name=Minimac2000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2020-02-17T06:19:12.075+0000)
>
> That would work if they moved away from her or attacked her for damage, but they don't. They just sit there inside senna's 6-700 attack range and give her more. Thresh risks dying every time he goes for a soul. Senna doesn't it's as simple as that why they shouldn't give gold, they aren't alive and they aren't a risk

Doesnt matter. Senna wastes an action to obtain them, thresh doesnt. Thats all that matters. 

Senna has to do something that could have been used to obtain CS or to damage a champion. There is a gold value attached to the action taken.

Because thresh passively picks up his souls, senna has to waste an action in order to obtain them, which has a potential gold cost.

Any minion type unit you kill in LoL gives you gold for this reason.
you say that like thresh is earning gold during the time he passively picks up his souls.

> [{quoted}](name=YaraOwO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2020-02-17T04:08:09.952+0000)
>
> you say that like thresh is earning gold during the time he passively picks up his souls.

Hes not wasting an action on doing so is the point. Which means he could be hitting CS or the enemy during this time.

Sometimes, mechanics are removed from an overloaded kit. For example, Thresh's lantern used to shield his entire team, Sylas used to have a shield on E1 which was changed to a magic shield and then finally removed, Irelia, Akali... Maybe something will be removed from Senna's kit somewhere down the line. She's still selling Prestige skins, though, so I wouldn't hold my breath.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vZHcpbrf,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2020-02-17T06:53:25.125+0000)
>
> Sometimes, mechanics are removed from an overloaded kit. For example, Thresh's lantern used to shield his entire team, Sylas used to have a shield on E1 which was changed to a magic shield and then finally removed, Irelia, Akali... Maybe something will be removed from Senna's kit somewhere down the line. She's still selling Prestige skins, though, so I wouldn't hold my breath.

They wouldnt remove gold on wraith kill. Theres a reason it exists, and it matches up with literally every other champion spawned killable in the game.
senna recently got released and the new champion is always over powered that's just how it is
Bc senna is riots favorite adc, so she gets free benefits as a member of riot-inducing games
